description: Emilia Clarke, 29, swapped the the gothic dress she wore at the Golden Globes for a light semi-sheer floral number at HBO's official afterparty inside the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Sunday night.
title: Emilia Clarke wears a sheer floral dress for HBO's Golden Globes afterparty
title_page: Emilia Clarke wears a sheer floral dress for HBO's Golden Globes afterparty | Daily Mail Online
text:
She stunned at the Golden Globes in a gothic sheer lace black gown.
But Emilia Clarke, 29, swapped the dark dress and its lengthy train for a light semi-sheer floral number at HBO's official afterparty inside the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Sunday night.
The Game of Thrones star looked radiant in the figure-hugging Dolce&Gabbana frock, which had embroidered poppies and daisies decorating its sides.
Scroll down for video
Transformation: Emilia Clarke, 29, swapped the the gothic dress she wore at the Golden Globes for a light semi-sheer floral number at HBO's official afterparty inside the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Sunday night
She matched the colour of the poppies with a slick of bold red lipstick, contrasting with her unblemished pale skin.
Her blue eyes were enhanced by smokey eye-shadow and a plentiful application of mascara. The star's brunette tresses with caramel tinting were tied back.
Standing with her hand on her hip, her small tattoo of a wasp on her left pinky finger caught the eye, as did her glistening silver bracelet.
See full Golden Globes coverage including highlights, results and fashion
Woman in black: Emilia stunned at the Golden Globes in a gothic sheer lace black gown with a flowing train
Flower power: The Game of Thrones star looked radiant in the figure-hugging Dolce&Gabbana frock, which had embroidered poppies and daisies decorating its sides
The diminutive actress, who measures 5ft 2ins, was given a boost by a pair of bronze Jimmy Choo stilettos.
Despite Game of Thrones losing out to Mr Robot in the Best Series, Drama category, Emilia didn't appear too disappointed as she flashed a huge smile.
On Saturday, she showcased her impressively-toned abs in a flirty leather pencil skirt at the Four Seasons in Beverly Hills.
Stylist Kate Young dressed the 29-year-old actress in a long-sleeved black crop-top, matching stilettos, and gold clutch for the BAFTA tea party.
Gorgeous: Her blue eyes were enhanced by smokey eye-shadow and a plentiful application of mascara. The star's brunette tresses with caramel tinting were tied back
Colour co-ordinated: She matched the colour of the poppies with a slick of bold red lipstick, contrasting with her unblemished pale skin
The Terminator Genisys star will reprise her role as Daenerys Targaryen in the sixth season of Game of Thrones, which premieres April 24 on HBO.
'There’s so much in store for her. It’s really exciting,' Clarke told the Los Angeles Times in July.
'It’s just go, go, go, go. Shocking moment to shocking moment. Epic moment to epic moment. It’s mental; it’s epic. And definitely Dany’s a part of it.'
